channel.title: Project Grow on ReFarmer.Net
channel.description: Recent content in Project Grow on ReFarmer.Net

item.title: Visualising Soil Moisture
item.description: It’s been a long haul, and before the rainy season comes around again….

item.title: GROW Observatory: making an impact
item.description: Since joining this project last August, we’ve deployed a whole lot of soil sensors across our landscape and spent more than a few hours collecting and uploading data, without having any real sense of the big picture, i.e.: What is the full scope and distribution of this Citizens Observatory? and what insight can we derive from the data gathered thus far? Well… Results are only just starting to come back from The Observatory, but the picture is pretty encouraging already, at least a far as the first question is concerned.
